sections.description: Students will pronounce selected letters of the Latin alphabet.
Translate simple Latin words to English.
Recite the alphabet chant from memory.

quiz_structure.scoring_notes: Each section is worth 10 points. Pronunciation accuracy, correct translations, and complete chant recall are required for full marks.
quiz_structure.review_before_quiz: Review the alphabet chant and practice pronouncing each letter. Revisit vocabulary words and their meanings.
